trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANANA601_03064_SEQ_00<tab>A problem weighs heavy on Eshana's mind.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANANA601_03064_TODO_00<tab>Obtain fish mint at East End.
TEXT_BANANA601_03064_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the fish mint to Jagranti.
TEXT_BANANA601_03064_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the jar of fish mint salve to Eshana.
TEXT_BANANA601_03064_ESHANA_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I have need of your assistance in preparing supplies quite vital to me and my sssisters.

TEXT_BANANA601_03064_ESHANA_000_001<tab>As you know, we Ananta take great pride in the appearance of our skin, and the lussstrous sheen of our scales. We require a special salve for our tails, which are prone to scarring from our ceaselesss patrols of the area.

TEXT_BANANA601_03064_ESHANA_000_002<tab>Before I can distribute any to my sssisters, however, we must ready ingredients to make more. It requires a great deal of time to produce, you see, and I would not have our ssstores empty the next time we are in need of treatment.

TEXT_BANANA601_03064_ESHANA_000_003<tab>I would ask you to travel to East End and procure four leaves of fish mint, a medicinal plant which grows at the base of the trees there. When you've found them, pray deliver them to Jagranti. She is the head of our medical station.
TEXT_BANANA601_03064_JAGRATI_000_005<tab>Would that I could go and retrieve more herbs for our medicine, but I cannot leave this place unattended.
TEXT_BANANA601_03064_JAGRATI_000_010<tab>Eshana requires salve for our sssisters? Then she knows we must first have more herbs.
TEXT_BANANA601_03064_JAGRATI_000_011<tab>Ah, this is more than enough. Thank you. I'll set to making more sssalve right away.
TEXT_BANANA601_03064_JAGRATI_000_012<tab>For now give her this. It is the last of our reserves until I can make more. This will take time of course, but it should be ready before we have need of it.
TEXT_BANANA601_03064_ESHANA_000_020<tab>You are returned. Was Jagranti able to provide you with any sssalve?
TEXT_BANANA601_03064_ESHANA_000_021<tab>Wonderful. My sssisters will be relieved to have this.
TEXT_BANANA601_03064_ESHANA_000_022<tab>Care for our tails is more than a matter of beauty, after all.

TEXT_BANANA601_03064_ESHANA_000_023<tab>A tail marred with scars for usss is like a pair of boots riddled with holes for you ssstriders. We can have no hindrances if we are to respond quickly to an emergency.
TEXT_BANANA601_03064_JAGRATI_000_025<tab>Take that salve to Eshana. Our ssstores should be replenished before we have need of it again.
